text: "Slime You Out" is second single off of Canadian rapper Drake's eighth studio album For All the Dogs. The song was released on September 15, 2023. The song also features American singer-songwriter SZA. The song was able to make it to #1 on the Billboard Hot 100, #1 on the Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs, #2 on the Canadian Hot 100, #3 on the Billboard Global 200, and #31 on the Rhythmic music charts. The song is about a relationship where one person uses the other person for their advantage before breaking up with them. Drake sings each month of the calendar while explaining the ups and downs of a relationship. SZA sings about the person she is with, saying that the guy she's with is cheating on other girls with her. Actress Halle Berry was angry because Drake used a picture of her getting slimed at the 2012 Kid's Choice Awards as the cover art for the song. She said he used it without her permission. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2023 songs Category:Drake (musician) songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs Category:R&B; songs
title: Slime You Out
